dense.desc_cn: 密集模式；占用更少的空间

size.desc: QChip size name or a CSS unit including unit name
size.desc_cn: QChip大小名称或包含单位名称的CSS单位

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

icon-right.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

icon-remove.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

icon-selected.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

label.desc: Chip's content as string; overrides default slot if specified
label.desc_cn: 碎片内容为字符串；如果指定，则覆盖默认插槽

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette
text-color.desc_cn: 覆盖文本颜色（如果需要）；来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

model-value.desc: Model of the component determining if QChip should be rendered or not

selected.desc: Model for QChip if it's selected or not
selected.desc_cn: 确定是否选中的QChip的模型

square.desc: Sets a low value for border-radius instead of the default one, making it close to a square
square.desc_cn: 设置较低的“边界半径”（border radius）值，而不是默认值，使其接近正方形

clickable.desc: Is QChip clickable? If it's the case, then it will add hover effects and emit 'click' events
clickable.desc_cn: QChip是可点击的吗？如果是这样，那么它将添加悬停效果并发出“click”事件

removable.desc: If set, then it displays a 'remove' icon that when clicked the QChip emits 'remove' event
removable.desc_cn: 如果设置了，那么它会显示一个“删除”图标，当点击QChip时会发出“remove”事件

ripple.desc: Configure material ripple (disable it by setting it to 'false' or supply a config object)
examples: { early: true, center: true, color: 'teal', keyCodes: [] }
ripple.desc_cn: 配置material波动（通过将其设置为“false”或提供配置对象将其禁用）

remove-aria-label.desc: aria-label to be used on the remove icon

default.desc: This is where QChip content goes, if not using 'label' property
default.desc_cn: 如果不使用“label”属性，这就是QChip内容的放置位置

click.desc: Emitted on QChip click if 'clickable' property is set
click.desc_cn: 如果设置了“clickable”属性，则在QChip点击后发出

update:selected.desc: Used by Vue on 'v-model:selected' for updating its value

remove.desc: Works along with 'value' and 'removable' prop. Emitted when toggling rendering state of the QChip

state.desc_cn: 渲染状态（渲染或不渲染）

remove.desc_cn: 与“value”和“removable”属性一起使用。切换QChip的渲染状态时发出
